name: Bubble Dragon
description:
Bubble Dragon is a simple game about guiding a little dragon through falling bubbles. It was made as a relaxing tool for a friend who has autism and needed something to do when dealing with sensory overload.

You click and drag your cursor around to guide the little dragon through the falling bubbles.

You can select from a variety of backgrounds and different sprites for the bubbles in the menu. Mix and match different head, body, and tail options to create your perfect dragon.

Bubble Dragon is in-browser only at the moment but we intend to offer a mobile version in the future.
